Title: Relates to establishing residential treatment facilities
Summary: Relates to establishing residential treatment facilities as an alternative to incarceration designated by the commissioner for the care and treatment of persons with serious mental illness who are accused of at least one felony level crime.
LawCode: Amd ยง7.18, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing residential treatment facilities
